COEW - Community order England / Wales

judicialResults.label: Unpaid work. Requirement to be completed within 12 months.
judicialResults.resultText:
UPWR - Unpaid work. Requirement to be completed within 12 months.
Unpaid Work Requirement: Carry out unpaid work for 45 Hours within the next twelve months. This work will be supervised by the responsible officer.

judicialResults.label: Imprisonment
judicialResults.resultText:
IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 6 Months. Reason: failure to comply with requirements of post custodial sentence supervision because of an unprovoked attack of a serious nature. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 0. Total custodial period: 5 Months.
